alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 8:19PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nassau and southeastern Charlton Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 818 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Folkston, moving southeast at 20 mph. The storm is about to collide with the Atlantic sea breeze which could strengthen it. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hilliard, Folkston, Callahan and Homeland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
